org.mechio.api.vision.messaging

Class RemoteImageServiceClient<Conf>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jflux.api.common.rk.playable.AbstractPlayable
      • org.jflux.api.messaging.rk.services.DefaultServiceClient<Conf>
        • org.mechio.api.vision.messaging.RemoteImageServiceClient<Conf>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jflux.api.common.rk.playable.Playable, org.jflux.api.messaging.rk.services.RemoteServiceClient<Conf>, ImageService

    public class RemoteImageServiceClient<Conf>
extends org.jflux.api.messaging.rk.services.DefaultServiceClient<Conf>
implements ImageService
    Connects to a remote ImageService through Messaging components.
    Author:
    Matthew Stevenson
